page.title: 17THE BARN DANCE
page.content: The barn dance is held after the village fete in July. It is held in a big barn at Stones farm in Sherborne. In the barn there is a bar,and a band who play on a trailer at one end of the barn.Most of the children go and play on the bales of straw in another barn,but some join in the dances.The barn dance goes on from 7o'clock till 12o'clock at night.We have to sit on straw bales at the sides.The barn is lit with coloured lights.A hot dog van comes so people have something to eat.Everybody enjoys it.We do lots of country dances.The barn dance is really good.
